name: correlation-id
hubDesc: Correlate requests and responses using a unique ID
description: Correlate requests and responses using a unique ID transmitted over an HTTP header.

fields.name: header_name
fields.help: The HTTP header name to use for the correlation ID.

fields.name: generator
fields.help: The generator to use for the correlation ID. Accepted values are uuid, uuid#counter and tracker See Generators.

fields.name: echo_downstream
fields.help: Whether to echo the header back to downstream (the client).
